channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Many Americans have come to rely on Chinese-made drones. Now lawmakers want to ban them
item.description: The economic and technological rivalry between the U.S. and China has come to the drone market, where Chinese-made flying devices are a dominant player in America.

item.title: Abortion opponents shift focus to pills with lawsuits, proposed laws and possible federal action
The new right celebrates Trump at a conservative conference and sidesteps inconsistencies
